reviews.review: Este es un juego fantástico, es como si Counter Strike estuviera intentando ser Call of Duty (como los más modernos, pero no los con microtransacciones), pero mantiene ese encanto que tienen los juego de Valve donde hacían lo mejor que podían con recursos más limitados, lo que lo hace más accesible a equipos menos potentes y tiene ese encanto nostálgico, como los easter eggs que remincen al equipo y proceso de desarrollo. Eso y además es sigle player :3.

[b] Counter-Strike: Condition Zero   1 мар. 2004[/b] 

Condition Zero позволяет нам сыграть как в классический мультиплеерный режим из CS 1.6, так и в специальную сингловую часть. Сингл представляет из себя набор различных карт, разделенных на несколько блоков в каждом блоке - по три карты. На каждой карте нам нужно выполнить ряд определенных условий: спасти заложника, убить определенное количество террористов определенным любым оружием, выиграть раунд за определенное время.

进游戏选择服务器玩了五六秒就闪退是什么操作？不兼容win10吗？有什么办法可以解决欢迎下方留言

Single Mission>

I'm playing level of expert, and remain only 3 maps.
It's just refusing to yield, not a fun. very boring...(why am I doing this....)

Basically, bot(computers) has aim hack and wall. Or auto respond to your movement. Even if you are careful on your foot sound, bot always know your approaching. So, just play again and again, and memorize enemy's appearance. It's the only way to win. But.... If you rush with your teammates(bot), the enemy would always fire on your head first haha. It's not your head size!! Don't blame on your head. The enemy is just hack.

Furthermore, the true enemy is your team, not the terrorist. They'd buy a flash bang and grenade in CT's home after buying a main weapon(rifle), and start to run just holding a FB, HE grenade though. Unfortunately, They have so so bad skill as compared with your enemy. Ten to one, terrorist could wipe your mate out easilly, and fool guys miss a grenade on his hand. If you running behind them, boooom!! (it's not a joke) Don't stand in front of team, They could kill you, not your enemy... (saddly, it's not a joke either.)

Terrorist force can make 'stick together' and our team mate couln't. Maverick guy is the worst above all. Maverick is the best shooter, but he is childish teenager... When the C4 ticking on A site, our team rush to the B Despite guarding B shortly before... OMG. And yet If you earn the point hardly and can employ level 5 guys, don't be upset on their terrible telant. Situationally, level 4 guys more useful than 5. Of course, The 5 point guys could cooperates more than 4 guys, but sometimes they interrupt your view and block the way. (Bull Sh** the "Lead the way, sir" get away from me plz!!!!) So, If you confident to your shooting, just let them go in the start point.

And... In the hostage resque mission, the command "hold posion" could help at the beginning because TR force is so strong and CT's not.

Wish your luck guys....... Delete the game is the only way to survive...

Almost the replica of Counter Strike 1.6 with some different player models and slight map differences. The maps of 1.6 and CZ are compatible with each other. This game along with 1.6 brought me into "FPS Gaming" back when I was a kid - came back from school to play with "online friends" and on weekends with school friends. 

I've had so many unforgettable memories with the game although I don't play them any more after CS:GO release :(
Best Counter-Strike game in the series
yes

Незачем придумывать громкие и красивые вступительные слова, ибо банальности действительно зачастую оказываются сильнее любых выкрутасов. История создания этой игры достойна того, чтобы снять головные уборы и пролить пару скупых мужских слез.Впервые анонсированная в мае 2001 года, Condition Zero успела сменить пять команд разработчиков. А уж сколько раз ее появление откладывалось, даже писать страшно.Одним словом, перед нами один из самых крутых и тяжеловесных долгостроев 2000х. Рекомендация крайне сомнительная, зато заслуженная.

I like the game overall! It is nice because it has both multiplayer servers, and local server content. You get more of you money with this one than Counter Strike and Team Fortress Classic, which are just multiplayer games with servers and no other content!  Overall, I recommend getting the game on sale like I did, it is not worth paying $9.99 for this old game. I got the Counter Strike Complete Bundle on sale for $1.28, and it was cheaper than all the games combined on sale! So, please just wait and get it on sale! It deserves a 8/10 for the game!

Counter Strike: Condition Zero é um jogo singleplayer baseado no clássico Counter Strike 1.6. É simplesmente um modo história do CS. O jogo é divertido e lembra muito o Half-Life 1.

Eu recomendo comprar. É um belo jogo.

A melhor definição do jogo que eu consegui pensar foi: Uma versão "Complete missões com objetivos" para Counter-Strike. Aqui não existe uma "campanha", nem mesmo história, mas um quadro de missões em diferentes mapas do CS, alguns clássicos e outros novos, onde deve ser obtida a vitória (contra bots) e preenchidos alguns objetivos extras (x headshots, x mortes na faca, etc) para liberar novas missões e prosseguir até o final.

Aliás, o jogo não termina no fim das missões especificamente, pois ao terminar todas as missões do nível fácil, tem-se a opção de jogar as missões de nível mais difícil, com bots mais inteligentes, precisos e com outros objetivos também mais difíceis. Por isso, pra fechar o jogo, é necessário completar Todas as missões de Todos os níveis de dificuldade.

Obviamente os inimigos são bots, mas acredite, perto do final o jogo fica muuuuuito difícil. Grande parte disso porque a cada missão que vc completa, novos pontos são concedidos para montar sua equipe, e é com base no total de pontos que você consegue montar uma equipe razoável ou extremamente ruim. Assim, muitas vezes o jogador pode ter que contar com a sorte para que os bots vençam o round, mesmo sendo inferiores aos bots inimigos. Sem falar que em alguns casos o jogador não pode ficar com 2 ou 3 rounds atrás da equipe inimiga, pois falha de imediato em sua missão.

Paciência, treino e sorte são a chave para o jogo!! Recomendo para que curte CS antigo e não liga tanto para gráficos, pois pode ser uma boa experiência para sair da rotina e continuar dando bala.

Já a versão adicional e alternativa do jogo, "Counter-Strike: Condition Zero Deleted Scenes" traz um modo história single player, jogável, mas não muito empolgante. Vale a pena pra quem deseja seguir todos os passos da franquia assim como eu

Gra ta ma świetną grywalność i przede wszystkim przyjemny klimat.
Dostępne bronie też są bardzo dobre, m.in. modele broni, dźwięki towarzyszące ich użyciu, aczkolwiek jest lekki problem z celowaniem przy ich użyciu, w każdym razie aby bronie były celne trzeba poświęcić trochę czasu na opanowanie ich, bo na początku jest tak, że mimo iż celujemy dokładnie w przeciwnika i strzelamy, to giniemy mimo, że to przeciwnik powinien zginąć, a nie my.
Na szczęście w CS: Source zostało to już poprawione.
